item.description:
OK, The Block, really known as BID, will be busy. And there is no fuel there. Might be a small landing fee. It's a short nice hop and a restaurant on field or we can walk into town. Best to go before the crowds really show up there.

It's 83 nm. nice scenic flight.... good wx is here!

http://www.airnav.com...

http://www.blockislan...
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet in the Terminal for this one. We can discuss if we want to go elsewhere or to the Block. Besides, we can have a coffee while we figure it out. Leave by 9, back by about noon.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Saturday Morning Breakfast to The Block
